More action and hair-raising stunts than you’ll find in four Bond movies’ EVENING TELEGRAPH
‘Thrilling, action-packed adventure’ GUARDIAN
DISCOVER THIS WILDLY-ENTERTAINING, GLOBE-TROTTING ADVENTURE FROM INTERNATIONAL BESTSELLER MATTHEW REILLY

* * * * *

What if the greatest lost cities of legend are still out there…

Jack West has just won the Great Games and thrown the four legendary kingdoms into turmoil. Now these dark forces are coming after him… in ruthless fashion.

With the end of all things rapidly approaching, Jack and his crew must find the Three Secret Cities – three incredible lost cities of legend.

It’s an impossible task by any reckoning, but Jack must do it while being hunted…
